		event_background = sitting_room

	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation

	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left

	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_cum = yes
				}
				desc = root_cum_f
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_stamina < 2
				}
				desc = f_very_low_stam

				trigger = {

		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 2
				}
				desc = m_very_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 3
				}
				desc = m_low_stam

			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 4
				}
				desc = m_med_stam
			}
			desc = m_high_stam
		}
		desc = LIDAs.1.desc
	}
	immediate = {
		lida_ongoing_sex_effect = {
			STAMINA_COST_1 = 0
			STAMINA_COST_2 = 1
		}
		check_if_root_cum_effect = yes
		store_subdom_value_effect = yes
		calculate_dom_success_effect = yes
		random_list = {
			# HANDJOB
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 1
				}
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = dom_transition_1
			value = -1
		}
		random_list = {
			# BLOWJOB_DOM
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 2
				}
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sub_transition_1
			value = -1
		}
		random = {
			chance = 5
			become_more_dom_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 5
				become_more_sub_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		# 1: EventsSex.HANDJOB_TEASE -> EventsSex.HANDJOB
		name = LIDAoption.1
		trigger = {
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
				NOT = { scope:root_cum = yes }
			}
			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 1
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 1
			}
		}
		show_as_unavailable = {
			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 1
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 1
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 1
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 1
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.3
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10001
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 2
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.4
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 2: EventsSex.HANDJOB_TEASE -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM
		name = LIDAoption.2
		trigger = {
			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 2
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 2
			}
		}
		show_as_unavailable = {
			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 2
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 2
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 1
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 2
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.4
	}

			# HANDJOB

				save_scope_value_as = {

					value = 3

			name = dom_transition_1

			# BLOWJOB_DOM
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 4
				}
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sub_transition_1
			value = -1
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:partner_stamina <= 0
			}
			random_list = {
				# HANDJOB_CUM_IN_HAND
				10 = {

						value = 5
					}
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = cum_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}

			chance = 5
			become_more_dom_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 5
				become_more_sub_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		# 3: EventsSex.HANDJOB -> EventsSex.HANDJOB
		name = LIDAoption.3
		trigger = {
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
				NOT = { scope:root_cum = yes }
			}
			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 3
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 3
			}
		}
		show_as_unavailable = {
			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 3
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 3
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 3
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 3
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.3
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10003
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 4
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.4
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 4: EventsSex.HANDJOB -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM
		name = LIDAoption.4
		trigger = {
			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 4
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 4
			}
		}
		show_as_unavailable = {
			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 4
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 4
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 3
		}

		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 4
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.4
	}
	option = {
		# 5: EventsSex.HANDJOB -> EventsCum.HANDJOB_CUM_IN_HAND
		name = LIDAoption.5
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					exists = scope:cum_transition_0
					scope:cum_transition_0 = 5
				}
				AND = {
					exists = scope:cum_transition_1
					scope:cum_transition_1 = 5
				}
			}
		}
		show_as_unavailable = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					exists = scope:cum_transition_0
					scope:cum_transition_0 = 5
				}
				AND = {
					exists = scope:cum_transition_1
					scope:cum_transition_1 = 5
				}
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 3
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAc.1
	}

	# Dom Blowjob
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAs.4.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}

	option = {
		# 6: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsSex.HANDJOB
		name = LIDAoption.6
		trigger = {
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
				NOT = { scope:root_cum = yes }
			}
			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 6
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 6
			}
		}
		show_as_unavailable = {
			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 6
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 6
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 4
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 6
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.3
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10006
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 8
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.6
			}
		}
	}

		# 7: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM

		# 9: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsCum.BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_DOM
		name = LIDAoption.9
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					exists = scope:cum_transition_0
					scope:cum_transition_0 = 9
				}
				AND = {
					exists = scope:cum_transition_1
					scope:cum_transition_1 = 9
				}
			}

					exists = scope:cum_transition_0
					scope:cum_transition_0 = 9
				}
				AND = {
					exists = scope:cum_transition_1
					scope:cum_transition_1 = 9
				}
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 4
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAc.2
	}
	option = {
		# 10: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsCum.BLOWJOB_CUM_ON_FACE
		name = LIDAoption.10
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					exists = scope:cum_transition_0
					scope:cum_transition_0 = 10
				}
				AND = {
					exists = scope:cum_transition_1
					scope:cum_transition_1 = 10
				}
			}
		}
		show_as_unavailable = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					exists = scope:cum_transition_0
					scope:cum_transition_0 = 10
				}
				AND = {
					exists = scope:cum_transition_1
					scope:cum_transition_1 = 10
				}
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 4
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAc.3
	}
	option = {
		# 11: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM -> EventsCum.BLOWJOB_RUINED_ORGASM
		name = LIDAoption.11
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					exists = scope:cum_transition_0
					scope:cum_transition_0 = 11
				}
				AND = {
					exists = scope:cum_transition_1
					scope:cum_transition_1 = 11
				}
			}
		}
		show_as_unavailable = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					exists = scope:cum_transition_0
					scope:cum_transition_0 = 11
				}
				AND = {
					exists = scope:cum_transition_1
					scope:cum_transition_1 = 11
				}
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 4
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAc.4
	}
}
LIDAs.6 = {
	# Sub Blowjob
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAs.6.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard

			}

				# Putting both hands on his waist, you attempt to curb his thrusts. However, on your knees beneath him, you don't have enough leverage to forcefully stop him and he seems to have no intention of letting you back in control.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10012
			}

					scope:sex_transition = 10017

				scope:sex_transition > 10000

			desc = sex_transition_17

			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 5
			}

			}

		lida_ongoing_sex_effect = {
			STAMINA_COST_1 = 1.0
			STAMINA_COST_2 = 1.5
		}

		store_subdom_value_effect = yes
		calculate_dom_success_effect = yes

			# BLOWJOB_DOM
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 12
				}
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = dom_transition_1
			value = -1
		}
		random_list = {
			# BLOWJOB_SUB
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 13
				}
			}
			# DEEPTHROAT
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 14
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# BLOWJOB_SUB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						scope:sub_transition_0 = 13
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_1
					value = 13
				}
			}
			# DEEPTHROAT
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						scope:sub_transition_0 = 14
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_1
					value = 14
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:partner_stamina <= 0
			}
			random_list = {
				# BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB
				10 = {
					save_scope_value_as = {
						name = cum_transition_0
						value = 15
					}
				}

				10 = {
					save_scope_value_as = {
						name = cum_transition_0
						value = 16
					}
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				# BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB
				10 = {
					trigger = {
						NOT = {
							scope:cum_transition_0 = 15
						}
					}
					save_scope_value_as = {
						name = cum_transition_1
						value = 15
					}
				}

				10 = {
					trigger = {
						NOT = {
							scope:cum_transition_0 = 16
						}
					}
					save_scope_value_as = {
						name = cum_transition_1
						value = 16
					}
				}
			}
		}
		random = {
			chance = 5
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 5
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		# 12: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM
		name = LIDAoption.12
		trigger = {
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
				NOT = { scope:root_cum = yes }
			}
			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 12
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 12
			}
		}
		show_as_unavailable = {
			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 12
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 12
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 6
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 12
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.4
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10012
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 13
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.6
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 14
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.7
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 13: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_SUB
		name = LIDAoption.13
		trigger = {
			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 13
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 13
			}
		}
		show_as_unavailable = {
			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 13
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 13
			}

			name = prev_event
			value = 6

			value = 13
		}

		# 14: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsSex.DEEPTHROAT

	option = {
		# 15: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsCum.BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB

		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					exists = scope:cum_transition_0
					scope:cum_transition_0 = 15
				}
				AND = {
					exists = scope:cum_transition_1
					scope:cum_transition_1 = 15
				}
			}
		}
		show_as_unavailable = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					exists = scope:cum_transition_0
					scope:cum_transition_0 = 15
				}
				AND = {
					exists = scope:cum_transition_1
					scope:cum_transition_1 = 15
				}
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 6
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAc.6
	}
	option = {
		# 16: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsCum.BLOWJOB_CUM_ON_FACE
		name = LIDAoption.16
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					exists = scope:cum_transition_0
					scope:cum_transition_0 = 16
				}
				AND = {
					exists = scope:cum_transition_1
					scope:cum_transition_1 = 16
				}
			}
		}
		show_as_unavailable = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					exists = scope:cum_transition_0
					scope:cum_transition_0 = 16
				}
				AND = {
					exists = scope:cum_transition_1
					scope:cum_transition_1 = 16
				}
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 6
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAc.3
	}
}

	# Deepthroat
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAs.7.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}

			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}

		}

		}

				desc = sex_transition_10017
			}
		}

			}
			# defaulted to 14: EventsSex.BLOWJOB_SUB -> EventsSex.DEEPTHROAT

					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 17
				}
			}

			value = -1
		}

			10 = {

					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 18
				}
			}

			name = sub_transition_1
			value = -1
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:partner_stamina <= 0
			}
			random_list = {
				# BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB
				10 = {
					save_scope_value_as = {
						name = cum_transition_0
						value = 19
					}
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = cum_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random = {
			chance = 10
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 10
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		# 17: EventsSex.DEEPTHROAT -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_SUB
		name = LIDAoption.17
		trigger = {
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
				NOT = { scope:root_cum = yes }
			}
			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 17
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 17
			}
		}
		show_as_unavailable = {
			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 17
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 17
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 7
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 17
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.6
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10017
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 18
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.7
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 18: EventsSex.DEEPTHROAT -> EventsSex.DEEPTHROAT
		name = LIDAoption.18
		trigger = {
			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 18
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 18
			}
		}
		show_as_unavailable = {
			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 18
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 18
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 7
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 18
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.7
	}
	option = {
		# 19: EventsSex.DEEPTHROAT -> EventsCum.BLOWJOB_CUM_IN_MOUTH_SUB
		name = LIDAoption.19
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					exists = scope:cum_transition_0
					scope:cum_transition_0 = 19
				}
				AND = {
					exists = scope:cum_transition_1
					scope:cum_transition_1 = 19
				}
			}
		}
		show_as_unavailable = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					exists = scope:cum_transition_0
					scope:cum_transition_0 = 19
				}
				AND = {
					exists = scope:cum_transition_1
					scope:cum_transition_1 = 19
				}
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 7
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAc.6
	}
}
LIDAs.2 = {
	# Ass Tease
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAs.2.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}

		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}

		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}

			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}

			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}

			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}

		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}

		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_cum = yes
				}
				desc = root_cum_f
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_stamina < 2
				}
				desc = f_very_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_stamina < 3
				}
				desc = f_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_stamina < 4
				}
				desc = f_med_stam
			}
			desc = f_high_stam
		}
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 2
				}
				desc = m_very_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 3
				}
				desc = m_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 4
				}
				desc = m_med_stam
			}
			desc = m_high_stam
		}
		desc = LIDAs.2.desc
	}
	immediate = {
		lida_ongoing_sex_effect = {
			STAMINA_COST_1 = 0.25
			STAMINA_COST_2 = 0.5
		}
		check_if_root_cum_effect = yes
		store_subdom_value_effect = yes
		calculate_dom_success_effect = yes
		random_list = {
			# ASS_RUB
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 20
				}
			}
			# HANDJOB
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 21
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# ASS_RUB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						scope:dom_transition_0 = 20
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_1
					value = 20
				}
			}
			# HANDJOB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						scope:dom_transition_0 = 21
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_1
					value = 21
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# HOTDOG
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 22
				}
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sub_transition_1
			value = -1
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:partner_stamina <= 0
			}
			random_list = {
				# ASS_TEASE_CUM_ON_ASS
				10 = {
					save_scope_value_as = {
						name = cum_transition_0
						value = 23
					}
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = cum_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random = {
			chance = 5
			become_more_dom_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 5
				become_more_sub_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		# 20: EventsSex.ASS_TEASE -> EventsSex.ASS_RUB
		name = LIDAoption.20
		trigger = {
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
				NOT = { scope:root_cum = yes }
			}
			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 20
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 20
			}
		}
		show_as_unavailable = {
			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 20
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 20
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 2
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 20
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.10
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10020
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 22
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.8
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 21: EventsSex.ASS_TEASE -> EventsSex.HANDJOB
		name = LIDAoption.21
		trigger = {
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
				NOT = { scope:root_cum = yes }
			}
			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }

			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}

			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance

				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 21
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.3
		}

			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}

				name = sex_transition
				value = 10021
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 22
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.8
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 22: EventsSex.ASS_TEASE -> EventsSex.HOTDOG
		name = LIDAoption.22
		trigger = {
			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 22
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 22
			}

			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }

				AND = {
					exists = scope:cum_transition_0
					scope:cum_transition_0 = 23

					scope:cum_transition_1 = 23

			}

			name = prev_event
			value = 2

LIDAs.10 = {
	# Ass Rub
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAs.10.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {

		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 20
				}
				# Ass Tease
				# You continue to rub his rod in between your buns. You can feel a coolness from [affairs_partner.GetFirstName]'s pre, slicking up your back. The contrast with the rhythmic thrusts from his hot member makes this an interesting experience.\n
				desc = sex_transition_20
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 24
				}
				# Ass Rub
				# You continue to rub his rod in between your buns. You can feel a coolness from [affairs_partner.GetFirstName]'s pre, slicking up your back. The contrast with the rhythmic thrusts from his hot member makes this an interesting experience.\n
				desc = sex_transition_24
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 28
				}
				# Get Hotdogged
				# Having rested a bit by letting him do the thrusting, you restart your own bounce to better control his pleasure.\n
				desc = sex_transition_28
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10020
				}
				# 20: EventsSex.ASS_TEASE -> EventsSex.ASS_RUB failed
				# You have better uses for that hard cock than just teasing it.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10020
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10021
				}
				# 21: EventsSex.ASS_TEASE -> EventsSex.HANDJOB failed
				# He recognizes what you are trying to do and twists his body to avoid having his member fully trapped within your fingers.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10021
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10024
				}
				# 24: EventsSex.ASS_RUB -> EventsSex.ASS_RUB failed
				# You have better uses for that hard cock than just teasing it\n
				desc = sex_transition_10024
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10025
				}
				# 25: EventsSex.ASS_RUB -> EventsSex.HANDJOB failed
				# He recognizes what you are trying to do and twists his body to avoid having his member fully trapped within your fingers.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10025
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10028
				}
				# 28: EventsSex.HOTDOG -> EventsSex.ASS_RUB failed
				# Having tasted a bit of control, he has no intention of relenting and giving it back to you.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10028
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10029
				}
				# 29: EventsSex.HOTDOG -> EventsSex.HOTDOG failed
				# Your thoughts are occupied by his vigorous thrusts, and you can't help but wonder what it would feel like to him thrust inside you.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10029
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10030
				}
				# 30: EventsSex.HOTDOG -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM failed
				# His vigorous thrusts invade your mind and you can't help but wonder what it would feel like inside of you. You won't be satisfied with just him inside your mouth.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10030
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 2
			}
			# defaulted to 20: EventsSex.ASS_TEASE -> EventsSex.ASS_RUB
			desc = sex_transition_20
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 10
			}
			# defaulted to 24: EventsSex.ASS_RUB -> EventsSex.ASS_RUB
			desc = sex_transition_24
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 8
			}
			# defaulted to 28: EventsSex.HOTDOG -> EventsSex.ASS_RUB
			desc = sex_transition_28
		}
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_cum = yes
				}
				desc = root_cum_f
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_stamina < 2
				}
				desc = f_very_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_stamina < 3
				}
				desc = f_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_stamina < 4
				}
				desc = f_med_stam
			}
			desc = f_high_stam
		}
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 2
				}
				desc = m_very_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 3
				}
				desc = m_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 4
				}
				desc = m_med_stam
			}
			desc = m_high_stam
		}
		desc = LIDAs.10.desc
	}
	immediate = {
		lida_ongoing_sex_effect = {
			STAMINA_COST_1 = 0.25
			STAMINA_COST_2 = 0.5
		}
		check_if_root_cum_effect = yes
		store_subdom_value_effect = yes
		calculate_dom_success_effect = yes
		random_list = {
			# ASS_RUB
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 24
				}
			}
			# HANDJOB
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 25
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# ASS_RUB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						scope:dom_transition_0 = 24
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_1
					value = 24
				}
			}
			# HANDJOB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						scope:dom_transition_0 = 25
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_1
					value = 25
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# HOTDOG
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 26
				}
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sub_transition_1
			value = -1
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:partner_stamina <= 0
			}
			random_list = {
				# ASS_TEASE_CUM_ON_ASS
				10 = {
					save_scope_value_as = {
						name = cum_transition_0
						value = 27
					}
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = cum_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random = {
			chance = 5
			become_more_dom_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 5
				become_more_sub_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		# 24: EventsSex.ASS_RUB -> EventsSex.ASS_RUB
		name = LIDAoption.24
		trigger = {
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
				NOT = { scope:root_cum = yes }
			}
			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 24
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 24
			}
		}
		show_as_unavailable = {
			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 24
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 24
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 10
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 24
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.10
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10024
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 26
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.8
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 25: EventsSex.ASS_RUB -> EventsSex.HANDJOB
		name = LIDAoption.25
		trigger = {
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
				NOT = { scope:root_cum = yes }
			}
			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 25
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 25
			}
		}
		show_as_unavailable = {
			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 25
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 25
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 10
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 25
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.3
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10025
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 26
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.8
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 26: EventsSex.ASS_RUB -> EventsSex.HOTDOG
		name = LIDAoption.26
		trigger = {
			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 26
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 26
			}
		}
		show_as_unavailable = {
			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 26
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 26
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 10
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 26
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.8
	}
	option = {
		# 27: EventsSex.ASS_RUB -> EventsCum.ASS_TEASE_CUM_ON_ASS
		name = LIDAoption.27
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					exists = scope:cum_transition_0
					scope:cum_transition_0 = 27
				}
				AND = {
					exists = scope:cum_transition_1
					scope:cum_transition_1 = 27
				}
			}
		}
		show_as_unavailable = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					exists = scope:cum_transition_0
					scope:cum_transition_0 = 27
				}
				AND = {
					exists = scope:cum_transition_1
					scope:cum_transition_1 = 27
				}
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 10
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAc.5
	}
}
LIDAs.8 = {
	# Get Hotdogged
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAs.8.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night

		}

		}

		character = root
		animation = flirtation
	}

		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 22
				}
				# Ass Tease
				# [affairs_partner.GetFirstName] wastes no time after you slow down to pick up the pace, his rod now doing the thrusting along your crack.\n

			}

				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition

				# [affairs_partner.GetFirstName] wastes no time after you slow down to pick up the pace, his rod now doing the thrusting along your crack.\n

					scope:sex_transition = 34

				# You pull away from his devious fingers to get a chance to recover. They accept it, for now, and resume thrusting between your buns.\n

			}

				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10020
				}
				# 20: EventsSex.ASS_TEASE -> EventsSex.ASS_RUB failed
				# You have better uses for that hard cock than just teasing it.\n

			}

					exists = scope:sex_transition

			}

					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10034

				# 34: EventsSex.STANDING_FINGERED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsSex.HOTDOG failed
				# You try to pull away from his devious fingers, but your endeavour is stopped by a particularly deep thrust scraping your inner walls.\n

			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10035
				}

				# You move to pull away from his fingers, but your endeavour is stopped by a particularly deep thrust scraping your inner walls.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10035
			}

				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 2
			}
			# defaulted to 22: EventsSex.ASS_TEASE -> EventsSex.HOTDOG
			desc = sex_transition_22
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000

				scope:prev_event = 10

			trigger = {

				scope:sex_transition > 10000

				scope:prev_event = 8
			}

			desc = sex_transition_29
		}

			trigger = {

				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 9
			}
			# defaulted to 34: EventsSex.STANDING_FINGERED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsSex.HOTDOG
			desc = sex_transition_34

				NOT = { scope:root_cum = yes }
			}

				scope:dom_transition_0 = 28

			}

			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 28
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 28
			}

			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}

			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance

				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 28
			}

		}

				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10028
			}

				}

			}
		}

	option = {
		# 29: EventsSex.HOTDOG -> EventsSex.HOTDOG
		name = LIDAoption.29
		trigger = {
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
				NOT = { scope:root_cum = yes }
			}
			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 29
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 29
			}
		}
		show_as_unavailable = {
			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 29
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 29
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 8
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = dom_success_adjustment
			value = 10
		}
		custom_tooltip = dom_success_adjustment_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 10
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 29
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.8
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10029
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 31
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.9
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 32
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.5
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 30: EventsSex.HOTDOG -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM
		name = LIDAoption.30
		trigger = {
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
				NOT = { scope:root_cum = yes }
			}
			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 30
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 30
			}
		}
		show_as_unavailable = {
			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 30
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 30
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 8
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = dom_success_adjustment
			value = 10
		}
		custom_tooltip = dom_success_adjustment_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 10
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 30
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.4
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10030
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 31
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.9
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 32
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.5
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 31: EventsSex.HOTDOG -> EventsSex.STANDING_FINGERED_FROM_BEHIND
		name = LIDAoption.31
		trigger = {
			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 31
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 31
			}
		}
		show_as_unavailable = {
			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 31
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 31
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 8
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 31
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.9
	}
	option = {
		# 32: EventsSex.HOTDOG -> EventsSex.STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND
		name = LIDAoption.32
		trigger = {
			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 32
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 32
			}
		}
		show_as_unavailable = {
			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 32
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 32
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 8
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 32
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.5
	}
	option = {
		# 33: EventsSex.HOTDOG -> EventsCum.ASS_TEASE_CUM_ON_ASS
		name = LIDAoption.33
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					exists = scope:cum_transition_0
					scope:cum_transition_0 = 33
				}
				AND = {
					exists = scope:cum_transition_1
					scope:cum_transition_1 = 33
				}
			}
		}
		show_as_unavailable = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					exists = scope:cum_transition_0
					scope:cum_transition_0 = 33
				}
				AND = {
					exists = scope:cum_transition_1
					scope:cum_transition_1 = 33
				}
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 8
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAc.5
	}
}
LIDAs.9 = {
	# Fingered from Behind
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAs.9.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:dungeon
		}
		event_background = dungeon
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:docks
		}
		event_background = docks
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:feast
		}
		event_background = feast
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:market
		}
		event_background = market
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:tavern
		}
		event_background = tavern
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:throne_room
		}
		event_background = throne_room
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:garden
		}
		event_background = garden
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:gallows
		}
		event_background = gallows
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:bedchamber
		}
		event_background = bedchamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:study
		}
		event_background = study
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:council_chamber
		}
		event_background = council_chamber
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:sitting_room
		}
		event_background = sitting_room
	}
	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 31
				}
				# Get Hotdogged
				# As if his earlier thrusting along your ass crack was in preparation, he plunges his fingers into your wet folds, with only a moan as a weak protest from you.\n
				desc = sex_transition_31
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 36
				}
				# Fingered from Behind
				# You melt into his hands as you surrender to pleasure.\n
				desc = sex_transition_36
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10028
				}
				# 28: EventsSex.HOTDOG -> EventsSex.ASS_RUB failed
				# Having tasted a bit of control, he has no intention of relenting and giving it back to you.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10028
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10029
				}
				# 29: EventsSex.HOTDOG -> EventsSex.HOTDOG failed
				# Your thoughts are occupied by his vigorous thrusts, and you can't help but wonder what it would feel like to him thrust inside you.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10029
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10030
				}
				# 30: EventsSex.HOTDOG -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM failed
				# His vigorous thrusts invade your mind and you can't help but wonder what it would feel like inside of you. You won't be satisfied with just him inside your mouth.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10030
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10034
				}
				# 34: EventsSex.STANDING_FINGERED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsSex.HOTDOG failed
				# You try to pull away from his devious fingers, but your endeavour is stopped by a particularly deep thrust scraping your inner walls.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10034
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10035
				}
				# 35: EventsSex.STANDING_FINGERED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM failed
				# You move to pull away from his fingers, but your endeavour is stopped by a particularly deep thrust scraping your inner walls.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10035
			}
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 8
			}
			# defaulted to 31: EventsSex.HOTDOG -> EventsSex.STANDING_FINGERED_FROM_BEHIND
			desc = sex_transition_31
		}
		triggered_desc = {
			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 9
			}
			# defaulted to 36: EventsSex.STANDING_FINGERED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsSex.STANDING_FINGERED_FROM_BEHIND
			desc = sex_transition_36
		}
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_cum = yes
				}
				desc = root_cum_f
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_stamina < 2
				}
				desc = f_very_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_stamina < 3
				}
				desc = f_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:root_stamina < 4
				}
				desc = f_med_stam
			}
			desc = f_high_stam
		}
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 2
				}
				desc = m_very_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 3
				}
				desc = m_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 4
				}
				desc = m_med_stam
			}
			desc = m_high_stam
		}
		desc = LIDAs.9.desc
	}
	immediate = {
		lida_ongoing_sex_effect = {
			STAMINA_COST_1 = 1
			STAMINA_COST_2 = 0
		}
		check_if_root_cum_effect = yes
		store_subdom_value_effect = yes
		calculate_dom_success_effect = yes
		random_list = {
			# HOTDOG
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 34
				}
			}
			# BLOWJOB_DOM
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 35
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# HOTDOG
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						scope:dom_transition_0 = 34
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_1
					value = 34
				}
			}
			# BLOWJOB_DOM
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						scope:dom_transition_0 = 35
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_1
					value = 35
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# STANDING_FINGERED_FROM_BEHIND
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 36
				}
			}
			# STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 37
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# STANDING_FINGERED_FROM_BEHIND
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						scope:sub_transition_0 = 36
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_1
					value = 36
				}
			}
			# STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						scope:sub_transition_0 = 37
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_1
					value = 37
				}
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:partner_stamina <= 0
			}
			random_list = {
				# ASS_TEASE_CUM_ON_ASS
				10 = {
					save_scope_value_as = {
						name = cum_transition_0
						value = 38
					}
				}
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = cum_transition_1
				value = -1
			}
		}
		random = {
			chance = 5
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 5
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		# 34: EventsSex.STANDING_FINGERED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsSex.HOTDOG
		name = LIDAoption.34
		trigger = {
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
				NOT = { scope:root_cum = yes }
			}
			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 34
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 34
			}
		}
		show_as_unavailable = {
			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 34
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 34
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 9
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 34
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.8
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10034
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 36
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.9
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 37
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.5
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 35: EventsSex.STANDING_FINGERED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM
		name = LIDAoption.35
		trigger = {
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
				NOT = { scope:root_cum = yes }
			}
			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 35
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 35
			}
		}
		show_as_unavailable = {
			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 35
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 35
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 9
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = dom_success_adjustment
			value = 5
		}
		custom_tooltip = dom_success_adjustment_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 5
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 35
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.4
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10035
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 36
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.9
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 37
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.5
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 36: EventsSex.STANDING_FINGERED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsSex.STANDING_FINGERED_FROM_BEHIND
		name = LIDAoption.36
		trigger = {
			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 36
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 36
			}
		}
		show_as_unavailable = {
			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 36
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 36
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 9
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 36
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.9
	}
	option = {
		# 37: EventsSex.STANDING_FINGERED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsSex.STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND
		name = LIDAoption.37
		trigger = {
			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 37
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 37
			}
		}
		show_as_unavailable = {
			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 37
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 37
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 9
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 37
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.5
	}
	option = {
		# 38: EventsSex.STANDING_FINGERED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsCum.ASS_TEASE_CUM_ON_ASS
		name = LIDAoption.38
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					exists = scope:cum_transition_0
					scope:cum_transition_0 = 38
				}
				AND = {
					exists = scope:cum_transition_1
					scope:cum_transition_1 = 38
				}
			}
		}
		show_as_unavailable = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					exists = scope:cum_transition_0
					scope:cum_transition_0 = 38
				}
				AND = {
					exists = scope:cum_transition_1
					scope:cum_transition_1 = 38
				}
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 9
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAc.5
	}
}
LIDAs.5 = {
	# Standing Fucked from Behind
	type = character_event
	title = LIDAs.5.t
	theme = seduction
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:battlefield
		}
		event_background = battlefield
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_night
		}
		event_background = alley_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:alley_day
		}
		event_background = alley_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:temple
		}
		event_background = temple
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_night
		}
		event_background = corridor_night
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:corridor_day
		}
		event_background = corridor_day
	}
	override_background = {
		trigger = {
			scope:locale = flag:courtyard
		}
		event_background = courtyard
	}

	left_portrait = {
		character = root
		animation = flirtation
	}
	right_portrait = {
		character = scope:affairs_partner
		animation = flirtation_left
	}
	desc = {
		first_valid = {
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 32
				}
				# Get Hotdogged
				# One of his thrusts, instead of going up, goes in between your thighs. Your wet folds dribble your anticipation onto his cock. Accepting your body's invitation, his next thrust pierces into you, eliciting a moan from your lips.\n
				desc = sex_transition_32
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 37

				# Surrendering to pleasure and wanting more, you reach down to guide his member to your entrance. Welcoming your invitation, he plunges into you fully.\n

			}

					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 41

					scope:sex_transition = 10039

				trigger = {
					exists = scope:sex_transition
					scope:sex_transition = 10040

				# 40: EventsSex.STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_SUB failed
				# You attempt to extricate yourself with gravity's assistance. However, he grabs your arms and hoists you up, giving you a few sharp thrusts while spanking you as punishment for trying to escape.\n
				desc = sex_transition_10040
			}
		}

			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition
				scope:sex_transition > 10000
				exists = scope:prev_event
				scope:prev_event = 8
			}
			# defaulted to 32: EventsSex.HOTDOG -> EventsSex.STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND

			trigger = {
				exists = scope:sex_transition

			trigger = {

				trigger = {
					scope:root_cum = yes

			}

				trigger = {
					scope:root_stamina < 2

					scope:root_stamina < 3
				}

				trigger = {
					scope:root_stamina < 4
				}
				desc = f_med_stam
			}
			desc = f_high_stam
		}

			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 2
				}
				desc = m_very_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {

					scope:partner_stamina < 3
				}
				desc = m_low_stam
			}
			triggered_desc = {
				trigger = {
					scope:partner_stamina < 4
				}
				desc = m_med_stam
			}
			desc = m_high_stam

	}
	immediate = {
		lida_ongoing_sex_effect = {
			STAMINA_COST_1 = 2
			STAMINA_COST_2 = 1.5
		}
		check_if_root_cum_effect = yes
		store_subdom_value_effect = yes
		calculate_dom_success_effect = yes
		random_list = {
			# BLOWJOB_DOM
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 39
				}
			}
			# BLOWJOB_SUB
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_0
					value = 40
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# BLOWJOB_DOM
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						scope:dom_transition_0 = 39
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_1
					value = 39
				}
			}
			# BLOWJOB_SUB
			10 = {
				trigger = {
					NOT = {
						scope:dom_transition_0 = 40
					}
				}
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = dom_transition_1
					value = 40
				}
			}
		}
		random_list = {
			# STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND
			10 = {
				save_scope_value_as = {
					name = sub_transition_0
					value = 41
				}
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sub_transition_1
			value = -1
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:partner_stamina <= 0
			}
			random_list = {
				# PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS
				10 = {
					save_scope_value_as = {
						name = cum_transition_0
						value = 42
					}
				}
				# FUCK_BEHIND_CREAMPIE
				10 = {
					save_scope_value_as = {
						name = cum_transition_0
						value = 43
					}
				}
			}
			random_list = {
				# PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS
				10 = {
					trigger = {
						NOT = {
							scope:cum_transition_0 = 42
						}
					}
					save_scope_value_as = {
						name = cum_transition_1
						value = 42
					}
				}
				# FUCK_BEHIND_CREAMPIE
				10 = {
					trigger = {
						NOT = {
							scope:cum_transition_0 = 43
						}
					}
					save_scope_value_as = {
						name = cum_transition_1
						value = 43
					}
				}
			}
		}
		random = {
			chance = 10
			become_more_sub_effect = yes
		}
		scope:affairs_partner = {
			random = {
				chance = 10
				become_more_dom_effect = yes
			}
		}
		debug_log_scopes = yes
	}
	option = {
		# 39: EventsSex.STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_DOM
		name = LIDAoption.39
		trigger = {
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
				NOT = { scope:root_cum = yes }
			}
			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 39
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 39
			}
		}
		show_as_unavailable = {
			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 39
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 39
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 5
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 0
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 39
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.4
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10039
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 41
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.5
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 40: EventsSex.STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsSex.BLOWJOB_SUB
		name = LIDAoption.40
		trigger = {
			custom_tooltip = {
				text = cant_dom_due_to_cum_tooltip
				NOT = { scope:root_cum = yes }
			}
			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 40
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 40
			}
		}
		show_as_unavailable = {
			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }
			OR = {
				scope:dom_transition_0 = 40
				scope:dom_transition_1 = 40
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 5
		}
		custom_tooltip = attempt_dom_tooltip
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = dom_success_adjustment
			value = 15
		}
		custom_tooltip = dom_success_adjustment_tooltip
		save_temporary_scope_value_as = {
			name = this_dom_chance
			value = {
				add = scope:dom_chance
				add = 15
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				scope:dom_success <= scope:this_dom_chance
			}
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = 1
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 40
			}
			trigger_event = LIDAs.6
		}
		else = {
			change_subdom_effect = {
				CHANGE = -2
			}
			save_scope_value_as = {
				name = sex_transition
				value = 10040
			}
			if = {
				limit = {
					scope:sub_transition_0 = 41
				}
				trigger_event = LIDAs.5
			}
		}
	}
	option = {
		# 41: EventsSex.STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsSex.STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND
		name = LIDAoption.41
		trigger = {
			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 41
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 41
			}
		}
		show_as_unavailable = {
			NOT = { exists = scope:cum_transition_0 }
			OR = {
				scope:sub_transition_0 = 41
				scope:sub_transition_1 = 41
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 5
		}
		custom_tooltip = voluntary_sub_tooltip
		change_subdom_effect = {
			CHANGE = -1
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = sex_transition
			value = 41
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAs.5
	}
	option = {
		# 42: EventsSex.STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsCum.PULL_OUT_CUM_ON_ASS
		name = LIDAoption.42
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					exists = scope:cum_transition_0
					scope:cum_transition_0 = 42
				}
				AND = {
					exists = scope:cum_transition_1
					scope:cum_transition_1 = 42
				}
			}
		}
		show_as_unavailable = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					exists = scope:cum_transition_0
					scope:cum_transition_0 = 42
				}
				AND = {
					exists = scope:cum_transition_1
					scope:cum_transition_1 = 42
				}
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 5
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAc.7
	}
	option = {
		# 43: EventsSex.STANDING_FUCKED_FROM_BEHIND -> EventsCum.FUCK_BEHIND_CREAMPIE
		name = LIDAoption.43
		trigger = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					exists = scope:cum_transition_0
					scope:cum_transition_0 = 43
				}
				AND = {
					exists = scope:cum_transition_1
					scope:cum_transition_1 = 43
				}
			}
		}
		show_as_unavailable = {
			OR = {
				AND = {
					exists = scope:cum_transition_0
					scope:cum_transition_0 = 43
				}
				AND = {
					exists = scope:cum_transition_1
					scope:cum_transition_1 = 43
				}
			}
		}
		save_scope_value_as = {
			name = prev_event
			value = 5
		}
		trigger_event = LIDAc.8
	}
